text: this place has delicious food an impressive menu selection and a highly competent staff ill surely be returning in the future

solid value with huge rooms a nice uncrowded casino and a great pool look its a b string hotel off the strip but close with easy parking good shows clean and a friendly crowd overall if you wait too long to make reservations this is a decent option

statement 3 the establishment offers a delightful and exciting atmosphere although it may not be the most kidfriendly option when compared to other nearby venues the waitstaff is physically attractive though their level of friendliness does not exceed what one might expect it is particularly wellsuited for individuals in their twenties looking for a vibrant place to enjoy happy hour and indulging in latenight festivities however the quality of the food is just satisfactory

we had to wait for 20 minutes until we were able to secure seats in this delightful establishment however the culinary treats surpassed our expectations and the service provided by the staff was exceptionally warm and inviting

i am genuinely impressed with the location and find the salon extremely charming cieras hairstyling skills completely transformed my look leaving me feeling rejuvenated and confident without a doubt i will be going back for more

the staff is extremely friendly and we are excited about seeing the various types of parrots while shopping its a bit far from my southwest location but it makes for a pleasant afternoon browsing plants and admiring the birds

the high praises surrounding this place had me genuinely enthusiastic when placing my takeout order as a fan of vegetables i made sure to exclusively choose vegetarian dishes regrettably the overall experience left me unimpressed nonetheless it seems that i am still on the lookout for that one remarkable chinese dining spot in the southeastern valley
despite the wait of 20 minutes for a table we found the location to be pleasant with delicious food and an extremely amiable staff

russells exceptional customer service makes you want to return every time its a relief to find a korean bbq restaurant in las vegas that serves incredibly delicious food especially as i recently moved here from hawaii russell even treated us with complimentary drinks and peanuts my top pick is the meat jun

hiltons outdated property exhibits subpar rooms that are far from clean or uptodate accompanied by poorly maintained surroundings the staffs ignorant and impolite behavior adds to the negative experience while the water park unintentionally attracts an undesirable clientele necessitating police intervention each night to manage rowdy inebriated guests it is recommended to seek accommodation elsewhere

you wont believe what a delightful occurrence it was getting the jack fruit poboy its a veggie delight that surpasses any expectations for pulled pork their inhouse brewed ginger beer is absolutely marvelous and i highly recommend asking for a dark and stormy even though it may not be officially listed on the menu

i placed an order for two different dishes but they turned out to be completely identical making it impossible to distinguish between them unfortunately both had a flavor profile reminiscent of a sweet and sour sauce even though i did not choose that option on top of that to my disappointment fried rice was included which i absolutely did not request this incident served as a reminder that there is a much better alternative than the current restaurant under consideration and that statement carries ample weight
how can you manage to have a bar that fluctuates in terms of crowd size yet remain incapable of meeting your financial obligations it falls on me to come up with a resolution

i placed an order for two different dishes but strangely enough both of them turned out to be exactly the same it was difficult for me to determine which dish was which because they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce even though i hadnt ordered that not only that but there also was no fried rice included which is commonly provided by panda express frankly speaking panda express is far better than this and that should tell you something
the ultimate brunch experience
the location of this establishment is extremely convenient as it is just around the corner from my apartment and they offer competitive fuel prices along with an amazing walkin freezer for beers
tasty foodbut avoid the anemic and overpriced taco salad that would be better priced at 199 rather than 699

this establishment is situated conveniently close to my apartment making it easily accessible and their highly competitive gas prices are complemented by an impressive walkin freezer fully stocked with an array of beers
the waiters at this particular place are stuffy and snobbish the food is just okay and we have decided not to return opting to dine at joes crab shack would be a more enjoyable choice

its chain pizza but its good  they offer a variety of flavored crusts and they really are flavorful  their howie bread is pretty similar to dominos breadsticks which arent the greatest but the flavors make them a lot better  and its cheap
many people highly recommend the bi bam bap due to its outstanding friendly service making it a fantastic choice

russells incredible customer service ensures youll be a repeat customer moving from hawaii to las vegas was made better by the knowledge of having a fantastic korean bbq spot to go to the taste is absolutely amazing and on top of that russell went above and beyond by serving us free drinks and peanuts personally i cant resist ordering their delicious meat jun

craving phenomenal vietnamese cuisine in the east valley youve got to try the best pho joint around where youll find pocketfriendly prices and the most heavenly fresh spring rolls my last feast included a scrumptious seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and an extra portion of those divine spring rolls all costing me a mere 25 undeniably this place has earned the top spot on my favorites list
this place is conveniently located around the corner from my apartmentncompetitive gas prices and there walk in beer freezer is awesome

by 430 pm a party of three had arrived and i managed to find an available seat i was quite impressed by the early evening rush as the place was bustling the level of service i received was fantastic prompting me to order the shrimp tacos highlighting the meal was the flavorful refried beans subtly infused with the taste of ham bone needless to say i am excited to make a repeat visit

huge beer selection  i stopped by at about 4pm on a friday and it already had a crowd  outdoor seating and lots of seats inside  i could see if it was crowded it would be hard to get to the bar  but maybe they have table service later in the night  the prices were average

despite eagerly anticipating the new pretzel burger with great hunger on a saturday evening my enthusiasm quickly waned as i was dismayed by a burnt bun and felt unjustifiably charged an exorbitant price
good food good menu knowledgeable staff would definately go again

statement 1 the staff is extremely friendly and we are excited to see the various parrots and birds they have in store although its quite a distance from my southwest location it offers a pleasant afternoon of birdwatching while shopping for plants

i decided to try two distinct dishes but i ended up receiving the exact same thing for both of them it was rather confusing because the flavors resembled sweet and sour sauce even though i didnt request that moreover there was no fried rice included which is normally present at panda express to be blunt panda express surpasses this experience by a large margin and that speaks volumes
the restaurant has a stuffy and arrogant wait staff the quality of the food is mediocre and we will definitely not be returning youll have a better meal at joes crab shack
the location of this place is very convenient just around the corner from my apartment they also have competitive gas prices and an amazing walkin beer freezer
i have been doing deliveries here and the overall experience has been positive thanks to the quality pizza and smooth service

russells outstanding customer service creates a memorable experience for customers ensuring their return as someone who recently relocated from hawaii to las vegas im thrilled to have found a korean bbq joint that serves incredibly tasty food russell went above and beyond by offering complimentary beverages and peanuts the meat jun dish is definitely my goto choice

statement 2 although the ambiance is fun it lacks the level of kidfriendliness found at other local places the waitstaff members have an appealing appearance but their friendliness falls somewhat short this venue caters more towards the energetic atmosphere of happy hour and latenight revelry preferred by those in their twenties nevertheless the food only meets average standards
with its prime location right around the corner from where i live this place not only offers affordable gas prices but also boasts a fantastic beer freezer that you can simply walk into
the pizza here is delicious and the service is excellent and my experience with their delivery service has been positive thus far

a group of three individuals arrived at 430 in the afternoon chose their own seats and were pleasantly surprised by how bustling it was for such an early hour the service they received was exceptional i decided to try the shrimp tacos and found them delicious especially when paired with the flavorful refried beans that had a hint of ham bone taste without a doubt i will return again in the future
how is it possible for a place with a relatively high number of patrons but insufficient funds to cover expenses forcing me to find a solution to this financial predicament
the ultimate destination for delectable brunch options
a haven for late breakfast delights

based on the previous ratings would you say that the restaurants service has become slower and do you agree that the management should receive retraining this was my third time visiting and i had hoped that the initial disappointments from my first two visits were simply a result of unfortunate circumstances but with this third letdown it feels like my patience has run out

the beer choices were extensive when i visited the place around 4pm on a friday it was already packed with people there were both outdoor and indoor seating options available with plenty of seats inside considering how crowded it was reaching the bar might have been challenging however there is a possibility that they offer table assistance later in the evening the prices were moderate in comparison to others

this pizza establishment specializes in a selection of delectable crust options and manages to overcome the mediocrity associated with chain pizzerias by enhancing their breadstickslike appetizer with tantalizing flavors all while keeping their prices affordable

dont underestimate this chains pizza its surprisingly good explore a variety of flavorful crusts that will surely please your palate although the howie bread may remind you of dominos breadsticks they might not be outstanding by themselves but the infusion of different flavors truly uplifts their taste also youll appreciate the budgetfriendly prices
the quality of the pizza and service here is impressive and my satisfaction with their delivery service has been consistently high
the location is amazing and the salon has a charming atmosphere ciera did an excellent job cutting and coloring my hair making me feel like a completely different person i will definitely return
this establishment has proven to be a reliable option for deliveries thanks to their delectable food and efficient operations

three people showed up at precisely 430 pm and took their places and they were truly amazed by how lively the atmosphere was so early in the evening the quality of service provided at the establishment was outstanding being a lover of seafood i opted for the shrimp tacos which exceeded my expectations what really impressed me though were the refried beans they had a distinctive hint of ham bone flavor that left a lasting impression i can say with certainty that my next visit is already planned

this is my initial visit to this place and i grab my cup proceed to fill it with my beverage only to discover an ant floating in it the restaurant appeared to be quite hygienic but i have a strong aversion to finding foreign objects in my food or drinks however the food was freshly prepared and served promptly

the hotel is of average quality and has spacious rooms an enjoyable casino with few people and a lovely pool although it is not located on the main strip it is conveniently nearby with ample parking entertaining shows and a welcoming atmosphere if you delay making reservations this is a satisfactory choice

despite my extreme hunger and excitement to taste the new pretzel burger i ended up going home disappointed on saturday night the reason being that my bun was severely burned which left me feeling upset additionally the price of the burger seemed way too high for what it offered
fun atmosphere but not as kidfriendly as other places in the area  the waitstaff is hot but not overly friendly  better for happy hour and late night madness for 20somethingsand food is just okay

i have been here numerous times before and during one instance i encountered a member of the staff who displayed an exceptionally impolite attitude if you are unable to offer satisfactory customer service it is possible that being a barista could be your sole profession for life hence i have resolved not to revisit that specific place in the future

russells incredible customer service makes customers want to come back every time its fantastic that i recently moved to vegas from hawaii and discovered a korean bbq restaurant with delicious food russell even treated us to complimentary drinks and peanuts my personal favorite is the meat jun dish
nice placewe waited 20 minutes to get seats but the food was very good the staff were so friendly

what leads to the paradoxical situation of having a partially occupied venue transforming into an overcrowded one while still struggling to settle bills ultimately leaving me to devise a way out

the service at this restaurant is consistently slow and its apparent that the management needs to invest in retraining their staff despite being my third visit i had initially dismissed the first two underwhelming experiences as mere bad luck but now i can confidently say that three strikes and im done

hiltons aged establishment presents visitors with rooms that lack modernity cleanliness and proper maintenance while its surroundings arent wellkept the behavior of the staff is uninformed and discourteous and the water park seems to attract a problematic crowd resulting in nightly interventions by law enforcement to remove intoxicated guests it would be wise to consider alternative accommodations

the location is convenient before a university of washington basketball game but it becomes crowded quickly due to its popularity the pub offers a good variety of beers although the quality of food is average
the cuisine is topnotch and the menu is impressive the staff members are exceptionally informed i would absolutely go back

the quality of their product is terrible i spent 50 on a lamp and the switch broke just after 5 months they refuse to accept returns after 90 days but if you visit the store they offer store credit instead
the bi bam bap provides an amazing dining experience with outstanding customer service that comes highly recommended

the staff members are exceptionally warm and welcoming and we cant wait to explore the assortment of parrots they have on display as we shop although its a bit of a journey from my southwest neighborhood it offers a delightful chance to indulge in the sights of these exquisite birds while discovering new plants
if youre looking for a delicious meal coupled with excellent customer service the bi bam bap comes highly recommended by countless satisfied customers

a trio of individuals made their way to the destination at 430 pm and settled into their seats it was rather surprising to see the place packed even during the early evening hours the service they experienced was topnotch leaving no room for complaints my personal order consisted of shrimp tacos which turned out to be quite pleasing to the palate the refried beans on the other hand carried a unique taste of ham bone flavor that added depth to every bite as a result i am more than willing to revisit the place in the near future

shame on you hilton old property outdated dirty rooms unkept grounds  ignorant rude staff and   water park draws the wrong element police on property every night to remove drunken guests look elsewhere

which is the topnotch pho spot in the east valley with incredible prices i absolutely adore their fresh spring rolls last time i indulged in a delicious seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and even ordered an extra serving of their delectable spring rolls — all for just 25 its definitely become my goto place
brunch heaven

having never been to this specific venue before i gathered my cup and proceeded to fill it with my chosen beverage only to be confronted by the presence of an unwelcome guest  an ant although the cleanliness of the restaurant seemed satisfactory i have a personal disdain for detecting any foreign elements in the items i consume nevertheless the food provided was made from fresh ingredients and delivered within a reasonable timeframe
savor the mouthwatering fare but stay away from the deficient and excessively costly taco salad that would be more fairly priced at 199 rather than 699

my previous visits to this location included an encounter with an exceptionally discourteous female staff member if their abilities in providing exemplary customer service are restricted to being just a barista i imagine i shall refrain from going back there again

when i visited around 4pm on a friday the bar already had a large crowd and offered an extensive variety of beers to choose from both outdoor seating and plenty of indoor seats were available although it might be challenging to reach the bar if it was crowded is it possible that they provide table service later in the evening furthermore the prices seemed to be average

the restaurant was enjoyable even though it took us 20 minutes to be seated the quality of the food was excellent and the staff displayed exceptional friendliness

offering excellent value generoussized rooms a pleasant and spacious casino and a remarkable swimming pool this hotel may not be on the main strip but is conveniently nearby with hasslefree parking entertaining shows cleanliness and a warm and friendly atmosphere it is definitely worth considering if you dont wait too long to book

at soupersalad you can enjoy a hearty meal of soup and salad for nearly 10 along with the choice of including a beverage the quality and selection of food make it a place worth returning to occasionally as its nearby and reasonably priced particularly suitable for kids who prefer water as their drink of choice nevertheless i hold the opinion that making patrons pay separately for a soda is somewhat unjustified

first time at this one and i get my cup and go fill up my drink only to find an ant in my drink restaurant looked fairly clean and all but i just cant stand finding stuff in my drinks or food but the food was fresh and out in a reasonable time
great location before a uw hoop game gets crowded good beer selection food isnt the best average pub food
with its proximity to my apartment this place is extremely convenient for me additionally they offer great deals on gas and have a fantastic walkin freezer stocked with beer
with its topnotch cuisine extensive menu choices and highly knowledgeable employees this establishment is definitely worth revisiting

are the previous ratings suggesting that the restaurants service has gotten slower and do you believe that the management needs to be retrained after having been there three times now i was really hoping that the disappointing experiences from my first two visits were just isolated incidents however with this third strike it seems like my optimism is misplaced

i absolutely adore the place and the salon itself is incredibly adorable cieras haircut and color left me feeling like a brand new woman both in appearance and confidence i am certainly planning to revisit

i have found both the pizza and service to be great at this place and my experience with their delivery service has been consistently positive
my excitement for trying the new pretzel burger on saturday evening quickly turned into disappointment as i discovered that my bun was burnt and felt that the meal was ridiculously overpriced

this offstrip hotel provides excellent worth and boasts spacious rooms a delightful casino with reduced crowds and an outstanding pool despite not being located directly on the popular strip it is conveniently nearby and offers easy parking enjoyable shows and a congenial atmosphere throughout for those who procrastinate in making reservations this serves as a respectable choice
the menu features delicious dishes and the staff is highly knowledgeable i would definitely visit again

the pizza may come from a chain yet it exceeds expectations in terms of flavor with an assortment of delectable crust options youll find yourself fully satisfied the similarity between their howie bread and dominos breadsticks may not be exceptional but the additional flavors greatly elevate their enjoyability moreover the affordability factor is worth noting

on my inaugural experience at this establishment i encountered an unfortunate incident where i found an ant in my drink after getting it and filling it up despite the overall cleanliness of the restaurant discovering foreign substances in my beverages or meals is something i simply cannot tolerate nevertheless the food was prepared using fresh ingredients and arrived promptly
a paradise for brunch lovers

the hotel offers good value for money and features large accommodations a pleasant casino that is not overcrowded and a superb pool it may not be situated directly on the famous strip but it is still close by offering convenient parking impressive performances and a warm and friendly crowd overall if you hesitate too long to book your stay this is a satisfactory alternative
it was a lovely establishment even though we endured a 20minute wait before finding seats nevertheless the cuisine surpassed our expectations and the personnel provided outstanding hospitality

soup and salad at almost 10 bucks with an option to have a beverage included is quite tempting i find the food and choices enjoyable so i might come back occasionally due to its proximity and reasonable price especially for kids who can opt for water however personally i believe charging extra for soda seems unnecessary

where can you find the most highly recommended vietnamese restaurant in the eastern valley that offers amazing value for money im a huge fan of their delightful spring rolls on my recent visit i indulged in their seafood addition flavorful meatball broth tantalizing shrimp stirfried rice and even treated myself to an extra serving of invigorating spring rolls all for a total of 25 needless to say this establishment has quickly become a personal favorite

if you want to have an amazing experience make sure to try the jackfruit poboy at two for two  its a veggie delight that will surprise you and dont forget to sample their homemade ginger beer or better yet ask for a dark and stormy
the wait staff at this restaurant is pretentious and unfriendly the food is mediocre at best and we have no intention of coming back youd have a better dining experience at joes crab shack

the employees are remarkably amicable and were eagerly anticipating the opportunity to observe the diverse range of parrots during our shopping trip despite being quite a distance away from where i live in the southwest it provides a delightful way to spend an afternoon surrounded by beautiful birds and searching for new plants
indulge in the delectable cuisine but refrain from the pallid and overpriced taco salad that would be better valued at 199 instead of 699

party of three arrived at 430 pm you seat yourself impressed with how busy it was so early in the evening service was great i ordered the shrimp tacos i liked the refried beans you could taste the ham bone flavor i will definitely be back

the quality of their products is terrible i spent 50 on a lamp only to have the switch break just 5 months later when you contact them they refuse to accept returns after 90 days however if you go to their location theyll issue you a credit note instead

believe previous ratings for this restaurant slow i mean slowservice management really should be retrained this was my third visit i hoped the first two disappointing experiences were just a case of just one of those daysbut three strikes im out

before a hoop game at uw the location is fantastic however it gets busy pretty quickly theres a wide selection of beers available at the pub but the food is just average and doesnt stand out from what youd expect in a regular pub

before a university of washington basketball match gets busy this place has an excellent location there are plenty of options when it comes to beer although the food isnt exceptional  just typical fare youd find in similar establishments

the bar i stopped by had an impressive selection of beers it was the kind of place that attracted a significant crowd even as early as 4pm on a friday whether you preferred sitting outdoors or indoors there were ample seats for everyone however navigating through the crowd could become difficult especially if you wanted to make your way to the bar perhaps come nighttime they introduced table service to mitigate this issue moreover the prices charged were fairly standard
paradise for midmorning meals

i absolutely adored the salons fantastic setting and convenient spot ciera skillfully cut and colored my hair giving me a fresh new look that left me feeling rejuvenated and confident without a doubt i plan on revisiting this salon in the future

two for two offers an outstanding dining experience where you should definitely opt for the jackfruit poboy instead of pulled pork  its a pure vegetarian dish that will exceed your expectations make sure to ask for their exceptional housemade ginger beer and try a secret offmenu delicacy called the dark and stormy

at 430 pm a group of three people showed up and i found a seat i was amazed at how crowded it was for an early evening the service was excellent and i decided to try the shrimp tacos i really enjoyed the refried beans which had a noticeable ham bone taste this experience definitely makes me want to return

three individuals arrived around 430 in the afternoon and i found a place to sit it surprised me how busy it already was for such an early hour the assistance provided was outstanding and i opted for the shrimp tacos the refried beans were particularly delicious with a distinct hint of ham bone flavor based on this delightful experience i will surely visit again

the positive reviews got me so hyped to order takeout from here being a vegetable lover i decided to go all vegetarian unfortunately it was just mediocre well the search for an amazing chinese restaurant in the southeast valley continues
the delivery experience at this place has been great so far with excellent pizza and satisfactory service
even though i havent eaten anything in a while lo and behold my drinks are now here after just 15 minutes i trust that the delay in service will be compensated by the deliciousness of the food

a wide array of beers awaited me when i swung by the bar around 4pm on a friday no wonder it was already bustling with customers with both outdoor seating and plentiful indoor seating options finding a spot to relax wasnt much of an issue nevertheless getting to the bar could prove challenging amidst the crowd it made me wonder if they introduced table service later during the night to alleviate this concern as for the alcoholic beverages cost they fell within the average range
the wait staff is pretentious and aloof the food is just average and we have no plans to come back your dining experience would be more enjoyable at joes crab shack

which eatery stands out as the ultimate choice for vietnamese cuisine in the east valley thanks to its unbeatable prices one thing that never fails to impress me is their delicious assortment of freshly made spring rolls during my last visit i couldnt resist trying their succulent seafood offering tasty meatball broth scrumptious shrimpinfused rice and a side of those heavenly spring rolls  and the best part was that it only cost me 25 undoubtedly this place has earned a special place in my heart

with its prime location near a university of washington hoop game this spot tends to fill up quickly it boasts a wide selection of beers though the cuisine is nothing out of the ordinary for such venues
its best to steer clear of the expensive and tasteless taco salad that should be reasonably priced at 199 instead of a whopping 699

customers are drawn to russell because of his exceptional customer service which keeps them coming back repeatedly moving from hawaii to las vegas has been exciting especially knowing that theres an amazing korean bbq place to satisfy my cravings on top of that russell delighted us with complimentary drinks and peanuts the mouthwatering meat jun option is hands down my absolute favorite

its unfortunate to witness the persistently sluggish service at this restaurant its high time the management takes action and provides retraining for their employees after enduring my third visit which turned out to be as dissatisfying as the previous two ive decided that three strikes are more than enough for me to call it quits

the reviews for this place were so good i was really excited to place my take out order i really like vegetables so i ordered all vegetarian items and i have to say it was just meh  oh well i guess im still looking for that one great place for chinese in the se valley

after ordering two distinct meals i ended up with identical dishes leaving me unable to differentiate between the two both had a taste resembling a sweet and sour sauce despite not being what i specifically requested furthermore to my surprise i also received an unwanted serving of fried rice this unpleasant encounter only reinforced the fact that another establishment surpasses the one in question and believe me thats saying something significant

their products have poor quality i bought a lamp for 50 and the switch stopped working after only 5 months when contacted they claim that returns are not accepted beyond 90 days but if you go to the store they provide store credit as an alternative option
the scrumptious cuisine is recommended but steer clear of the lackluster and exorbitantlypriced taco dish that should be reasonably priced at 199 instead of 699
the ambiance was pleasant although we had to wait for 20 minutes before being seated however the quality of the food was exceptional and the individuals attending to us were incredibly amicable

i was filled with anticipation after reading such glowing reviews about this establishment leading me to eagerly place my order for takeout given how much i enjoy vegetables i specifically selected all vegetarian options however i must admit that the outcome was rather lackluster regardless it appears that my quest for a standout chinese eatery in the southeastern part of the valley continues
how is it possible to have a bar that ranges from somewhat busy to very busy yet struggle to pay your expenses i need to find a solution

this decent option offers a good value spacious rooms an uncrowded casino and a fantastic pool although it is situated away from the popular strip it is conveniently close has easy parking enjoyable shows cleanliness and a friendly crowd dont delay your reservations too much if you want to experience it

do you think the past ratings indicate that the restaurants service has become slower and believe that the management should undergo retraining i had visited this place for the third time hoping that the disappointing experiences on the first two occasions were just due to bad luck but after this third visit i feel like three strikes and im out

their product excellence leaves much to be desired i shelled out 50 for a lamp yet its switch failed after only 5 months although their customer support refuses to grant returns past the initial 90day window it is worth noting that they would provide store credit upon visiting their premises

this is my initial visit to this place and as soon as i pour my beverage into the cup i discover an ant in it although the restaurant appeared clean i have a strong aversion to finding any foreign objects in my food or drinks however the food was fresh and served fairly quickly

hiltons old property has rooms that are outdated dirty and unkept with grounds that are not wellmaintained the staff is ignorant and rude and the water park attracts an undesirable crowd leading to the presence of police on the premises every night to deal with intoxicated guests it is recommended to explore other options

i havent even ate yet 15 min and wow here come my drinks hope theft food makes up for the slow service

although it offers a fun and vibrant setting the place is not as welcoming to children as other options in the area the waitstaff exudes a pleasant physical appearance without being exceptionally warm in their demeanor it shines during happy hour and latenight revelries primarily attracting young adults but the food falls into the average category

for a truly positive dining adventure head over to two for two and indulge in their jackfruit poboy a deliciously satisfying alternative to pulled pork dont miss out on their excellent homemade ginger beer and if youre feeling adventurous request the enticing dark and stormy a hidden gem not stated on the menu

i am disappointed with the slow service at this restaurant and the management should consider retraining their staff this was my third visit and i had hoped that the previous disappointing experiences were just isolated incidents however three strikes and im out

its been 15 minutes since i last ate and now my beverages have arrived lets hope the slowness of the service is outweighed by the deliciousness of the dishes

stuffy snobby wait staff  food just soso  we will not return  you would be better off eating joes crab shack

i have visited this place multiple times and during one of my visits i encountered an extremely impolite female staff member if they are unable to provide excellent customer service its possible that they will remain as a barista indefinitely i suppose i wont be returning there in the future

a great choice for those seeking bang for their buck this hotel impresses with its large wellappointed rooms a peaceful and spacious casino and an outstanding pool facility while it may not be located directly on the lively strip its in close proximity and boasts convenient parking great shows cleanliness and a welcoming crowd overall make your reservations soon to seize this decent alternative

hiltons old property has outdated and dirty rooms unkept grounds an ignorant and rude staff and a water park that attracts the wrong crowd the police have to remove drunken guests every night making it a place you should consider avoiding

the location is ideal before a university of washington basketball game becomes packed the beer selection is impressive but the cuisine leaves much to be desired its a decent spot for pregame drinks and grub

the ratings for this establishment were extremely positive which got me thrilled to order my meal for takeout being a vegetable enthusiast i opted for solely vegetarian dishes unfortunately the experience turned out to be quite underwhelming nevertheless it seems that my search for an exceptional chinese restaurant in the southeast valley is still ongoing

i received two separate orders but they were identical and i couldnt distinguish between them because they both tasted like sweet and sour sauce which was not what i had ordered and to make matters worse there was no fried rice which is a staple at panda express honestly panda express is superior in comparison and thats saying something

being situated just around the corner from my apartment this place couldnt be more conveniently located on top of that their gas prices are competitive and their walkin beer freezer is absolutely incredible
good pizza   good service i do the delivery thing here and so far so good

very friendly staff and we look forward to seeing all the different parrotsbirds they have while we shop its a bit of a drive from my area southwest but it makes for a nice afternoon enjoying the birds while shopping for plants
despite attracting a significant number of customers why does the establishment fail to meet its financial obligations leaving me responsible for finding a resolution

although it falls into the category of chain pizza this particular eatery shines through its enticing assortment of crust flavors elevating its notsostellar breadstick alternative to new heights with delightful tastes and all without breaking the bank

the atmosphere of the venue was delightful despite the fact that we had to wait for 20 minutes until we could find available tables nonetheless the food tasted remarkable and the individuals serving us displayed exceptional warmth and friendliness
the bi bam bap receives high acclaim for its exceptional friendly service and is strongly endorsed

on saturday evening i eagerly arrived at this new place to try their pretzel burger only to find my bun completely burnt it was such a disappointment especially considering how hungry and excited i was moreover the price i paid for it felt excessive

i have visited this place multiple times and there was a particular employee who displayed extremely rude behavior if you are incapable of providing superior customer service it appears that being a barista may be your only career path therefore i have made the decision not to return to that establishment
my hunger remains unfulfilled but to my astonishment my beverages arrive just 15 minutes later i desire that the quality of the food will offset the sluggishness of the service

the jack fruit poboy had such a positive impact on my taste buds during both occasions its a surprising vegetarian option thats far from being mistaken for pulled pork the beverages they offer are truly exceptional particularly their homemade ginger beer if you want something unique try asking for a dark and stormy despite its absence from the menu

what is the toprated spot for vietnamese noodle soup in the eastern valley with incredible prices i absolutely love their refreshing spring rolls my order included a delectable seafood option flavorful meatball pho mouthwatering shrimp fried rice and an additional serving of fresh spring rolls  all for just 25 this place is without a doubt one of my favorites

the ambiance is enjoyable although not as suitable for children compared to other establishments nearby the waitstaff is attractive without being excessively friendly it is more preferable for happy hour and latenight excitement for individuals in their twenties while the food is only average
customers rave about the bi bam baps superb service and recommend it without hesitation

for just under 10 you have the option to add a beverage to your meal at soupersalad i like the variety of options available and may revisit occasionally due to its proximity and reasonable prices for children who can opt for water however i believe charging extra for soda is unnecessary

ive frequented this location on several occasions and i encountered an individual staff member who exhibited incredibly disrespectful behavior if you are unable to deliver exceptional customer service it seems that being a barista might be your lifelong occupation consequently i will refrain from revisiting that place again
the service at this establishment is uptight and elitist the quality of the food is only average and we wont be visiting again it would be wiser to choose joes crab shack for your meal instead

the waiters and waitresses at this establishment are pretentious and unfriendly the food is only satisfactory and we have no intention of revisiting youll have a far superior dining experience at joes crab shack

russell is the most nicest person his customer service makes u come back everytime  i just moved to vegas from hawaii and its great to know that theres a korean bbq joint that i can go to that taste amazingly good he hooked us up with free drinks and peanuts the meat jun is my favorite
i havent had a meal yet and in just 15 minutes my drinks have arrived hopefully the quality of the food compensates for the sluggish service

with russells outstanding customer service theres no doubt that ill be coming back for more being new in town after moving from hawaii to las vegas its reassuring to discover a phenomenal korean bbq joint that serves food that tastes unbelievably good russell even surprised us with complimentary drinks and peanuts but my absolute favorite is definitely their mouthwatering meat jun

i received two different dishes but they turned out to be exactly the same making it difficult to distinguish between them they both tasted like a sweet and sour sauce even though i didnt order that surprisingly there was also fried rice included which wasnt what i wanted its safe to say that this experience made me realize that another restaurant is far superior in comparison and trust me that says a great deal
the food was excellent the menu had great options and the staff was very wellinformed i would definitely visit again

statement 1 while the atmosphere is enjoyable it may not be as suitable for children compared to other establishments in the vicinity the waitstaff is attractive yet their friendliness might not exceed expectations it is recommended for young adults in their twenties who are seeking a lively happy hour and latenight excitement however the quality of the food is mediocre

best pho place in the east valley and prices are fantastic i am a huge fan of the fresh spring rolls i ordered a seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and order of fresh spring rolls for 25 definitely a favorite

if youre looking for accommodations at hiltons older property be aware that its rooms are outdated and unkempt the surrounding grounds are in poor condition the staff can be uninformed and impolite and the water park draws an unfavorable crowd to make matters worse the presence of drunken guests often leads to police involvement on the premises every night considering these factors it would be advisable to explore alternatives elsewhere

its a pizza chain but surprisingly delicious they provide a wide range of crust flavors that truly satisfy your taste buds their howie bread closely resembles dominos breadsticks which may not be topnotch but the added flavors definitely enhance the overall experience plus its affordable
love the location and the salon is super cute ciera cut and colored my hair left looking and feeling like a new woman will def go back
i havent had a meal yet and within 15 minutes i am surprised to see my drinks arriving i hope the food compensates for the slow service

their quailty stinks  i paid 50 for a lamp and the switch broke 5 months later  when you call they say that they wont take it back after 90 days  however it you go to the store they will give you a store credit

the excellent reviews had me incredibly excited to try their takeout service being a fan of vegetables i made sure to order only vegetarian dishes unfortunately the overall experience was underwhelming nevertheless my exploration for that perfect chinese restaurant in the southeastern valley persists

for just under 10 you can get soup and salad at soupersalad with the added benefit of having a drink included in the meal i appreciate the variety of food options and taste which makes me inclined to revisit every now and then given its convenient location and affordable price especially when considering children who prefer water over other beverages nonetheless it doesnt seem fair to charge additional fees for a soda
the food is excellent and there is a wide selection to choose from the staff is very wellinformed i would certainly return

what a positive experience two for two ask for the jack fruit poboy you wont believe it no its not pulled pork its pure veggie the drinks are marvelous they make their own ginger beer its not on the menu but ask for a dark and stormy

looking for the ultimate pho experience in the east valley this hidden gem offers unbeatable prices along with their mouthwatering fresh spring rolls during my recent visit i relished in the flavors of their seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and even treated myself to an additional order of those delightful spring rolls for only 25 without a doubt it has secured a special place in my heart

i was super thrilled about placing my takeout order from this place because of the rave reviews as someone who enjoys vegetables i opted for a completely vegetarian meal however the experience turned out to be just average oh well the quest for that extraordinary chinese eatery in the southeastern part of the valley is still ongoing

oh soupersalad for nearly 10 you can include a drink in the mealnni enjoy the food and the selection i will probably return from time to time because its close and its a decent price for the kids who can have waternnbut really i dont think the soda should be an additional cost

set apart from typical chain pizzerias this place impresses with a diverse range of crust flavor options that transform their reminiscentofdominos breadsticks into a far more enjoyable treat thanks to the added burst of deliciousness and at an incredibly reasonable cost

statement 2 the staff members are exceptionally amiable and we are eager to observe the assortment of parrots and birds available at their store despite the considerable driving distance from my southwest neighborhood it provides a delightful opportunity to enjoy the avian species while browsing for plants

soupersalad provides the option of including a beverage in your meal for nearly 10 the wide range of choices and satisfied palate make me inclined to return from time to time especially considering its proximity and reasonable pricing for children who are better off opting for water however i firmly believe that there should be no added expense for soda
indulging in a heavenly brunch
